channel.title: Quick problem
channel.description: I have used No-Ip and Portforwarded and everything. But It seems to not work. I cant log onto my server with the no-ip. Help?

item.title: Quick problem
item.dc:creator: @kingtren kingtren
item.description:
@kingtren wrote:

You need to add a static ip, otherwise your computer will continue changing your local host ip, your local ip is generally 192.168.1.1 all the way up to 192.168.1.100, you need to find your local host connection click on IPV4. and change it to a static Ip, Of 192.168.1.1 or anything along those lines up to 100. Gl

Read full topic

item.title: Quick problem
item.dc:creator: @Joker420 Joker420
item.description:
@Joker420 wrote:

When i try to upload it to the Server Status page it says its offline. I dont know what to do. I have portforwarded and everything. What am I doing wrong? I’ve read every guide and it still dont work.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick problem
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

You log on with the localhost ip
127.0.0.1
or
0.0.0.0
The other people log with ur no-ip address

Read full topic

item.title: Quick problem
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You’re not suppose to log in using your no-ip. Other people use the no-ip, you continue using localhost.

Read full topic
